item.title: Large pot hole on the road near pavement, 17th January
item.description:
I'm a residents living at 26 West street. When a car passes over the pot hole it splashes water all over of my front house and window. I have a new born baby and it is very difficult to push the buggy out of my house. This is very serious & dangerous for the residents because the street is very narrow and i noticed some cars go very fast & don't realise this large pot holes out side my house. This could cause a serious accident for the public and residents. This pot hole only appeared around a week ago or since the cold weather recently. I would be greatful if you could come and fix this pot hole as soon as possible. Thanks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): West Street, Blendon, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Poor informant of road signs, 17th January
item.description:

item.title: Slippery leaves on path to station, 17th January
item.description:

item.title: Flickering light outside Benyon Court, street lights out too, 17th January
item.description:
The main light outside Benyon Court is flickering non-stop when it comes on in the evenings, and the stree lamps (numbers 19 and 20) in the small roundabout with the tree just outside the court are not working at all.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): De Beauvoir Estate, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 45 friars road blocks the road with toad cones, 17th January
item.description:
The family at number 45 friars road puts cones on the road so no one can park outside their house. This has been going on for about a month now

Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bus stop f -countdown not working, 17th January
item.description:
BUS STOP F - COUNTDOWN NOT WORKING Bus stop F - Countdown unit not working Outside -: “The Portland Hospital, 205-209 Great Portland St, London W1W 5AH” (Bus Stop F). Despite previous reports indicating the matter has been resolved, the problem remains unaddressed. Please kindly investigate. Many thanks,

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 205-207, Great Portland Street, Marylebone, City of Westminster
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Water leakage on road, 17th January
item.description:
Water leak coming up through tarmac on Humber Road (Vanbrugh end) and flowing into the drain in the photo. There was a similar leak on the same road a week ago, at Halstow end. Suspect this was caused by the sub zero freezing conditions to water pipework.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Dinsdale Road, Blackheath
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 6 street lights out again, 17th January
item.description:
6 street lights out again along Bexley Road. Starting at bus stop AM to Parish gate drive. It feels unsafe and some of these lights were only fixed in December!
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Bexley Road, Eltham
Report on FixMyStreet
